Nested Class Summary
static interface ShoveGestureDetector.OnShoveGestureListener
          Listener which must be implemented which is used by ShoveGestureDetector to perform callbacks to any implementing class which is registered to a ShoveGestureDetector via the constructor.

handleStartProgressEvent

protected void handleStartProgressEvent(int actionCode,
                                        android.view.MotionEvent event)
Description copied from class: BaseGestureDetector
Called when the current event occurred when NO gesture is in progress yet. The handling in this implementation may set the gesture in progress (via mGestureInProgress) or out of progress

Specified by:

                                     android.view.MotionEvent event)
Description copied from class: BaseGestureDetector
Called when the current event occurred when a gesture IS in progress. The handling in this implementation may set the gesture out of progress (via mGestureInProgress).

isSloppyGesture

protected boolean isSloppyGesture(android.view.MotionEvent event)
Description copied from class: TwoFingerGestureDetector
Check if we have a sloppy gesture. Sloppy gestures can happen if the edge of the user's hand is touching the screen, for example.
